page.title: 06FOLKLORE OF WEST KILBRIDE
page.content: There are supposed to be{ghosts}in the{dungeons}of Law Castle. There is also a{tunnel}from the castle which leads down to the shore.However the tunnel is impassible due to a build up of water.{Law Castle}is said to be haunted by an archer. He was fighting a battle when suddenly an arrow with a white handkerchief tied to the end of it came shooting at him from nowhere.The arrow went through his neck, embedding itself in the wall behind. He comes at night and if you see him with a white handkerchief in his hand it means he is challenging you to a fight. The back road that leads down to Seamill is{haunted}by an old man. He comes out at night, dressed in black and carrying an old walking stick. If you flash your car lights on him he will disappear.
